events.title: John Deere Information Session
events.desc: Learn about John Deere's opportunities and culture of software developers through a highlight of digital products and IoT devices customers use to manage farm operations. Food will be provided.

events.title: Resume Jam Session
events.desc: Calling all freshmen and sophomores! Want to go to the career fair but don't have a resume? Need help finishing (or starting) your resume? Want to get advice from experienced upperclassmen who have worked in the field? Already have a resume, but want free pizza? If any of these apply to you, join ACM-W in the Computer Science building room 202 from 4:30 to 5:30 on Thursday the 19th! If you have a laptop, we suggest you bring it. Upperclassmen are welcome to attend if you would like a peer's opinion.

events.title: Career Fair Dinner
events.desc: Talk to companies looking for Computer Science students for longer than a 2-minute career fair interaction, without the hassle of waiting in long lines. Join ACM at our fall Career Fair Dinner! Reminder: You must be an ACM member to participate in the dinner.

events.title: Programming Cup
events.desc: Come out and see who is the best programmer on campus! A number of programming languages are accepted including: C++, Java, Python 2 & 3, C, C#, Go, Javascript, Objective-C, PHP, Prolog, Ruby, and Scala.

events.title: WiFi Workshop
events.desc: A practical workshop on common WiFi vulnerabilities.

events.title: Lockpicking Fundraiser
events.desc: Learn how to lockpick and compete to win a lockpicking set. Proceeds support ACM Security.

events.title: MinerLAN
events.desc: Relax, eat food, and play games to win prizes with ACM before starting finals!
